name: Arturo Fuente - OpusX - OXO Oro Oscuro - PerfecXion No. 4
brand: Arturo Fuente, OpusX, OXO Oro Oscuro
additionalNotes:
The yellow-orange box, signature of Arturo Fuente Opus X Dark Gold, promises the discovery of a treasure worthy of the followers of the brand. Inside this exquisite case, you will discover a perfectly crafted module, featuring Opus X's magnificent Dominican wrapper, which has undergone a lengthy fermentation 
Since 2015, this ultra rare edition has been released annually in extremely limited quantities. In other words, each box is a collector's item that is "hoarded" on the market.
